Description.Text: Guests can enjoy all the services offered in the Hotel Playa Santa Ponsa. The hotel amenities are: bar, children's facilities, conference facilities, currency exchange, disabled facilities, doctor on call, dry cleaning, games room, internet access-wireless, laundry service, lift/elevator, reception, restaurant, spa service (massage, facial, steam room, etc), solarium, swimming pool outdoor.
Located just 200 meters from the beach, this hotel is minutes from a wide range of shops, bars and restaurants.
